flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=190>>190 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 190 = <<1/8*190=95/4>>95/4 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 95/4 x 3 = <<95/4*3=285/4>>285/4 pounds.
He now weighs 190 - 285/4 = <<190-285/4=475/4>>475/4 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 475/4 = <<156-475/4=149/4>>149/4 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 192, not 190. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
